thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 19 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: FOREX-Dollar index's losses grow as U.S. consumer sentiment weakens

author: Reuters Editorial
title: FOREX-Dollar index's losses grow as U.S. consumer sentiment weakens
text:
NEW YORK, Jan 19 (Reuters) - The dollar added to its losses versus a group of currencies on Friday as the University of Michiganâ€™s gauge on U.S. consumer sentiment in early January unexpectedly weakened to its lowest level since July.
At 10:11 AM (1511 GMT), the index that tracks the greenback against a basket of currencies on a trade-weighted basis was last down 0.08 pct at 90.465. It was not far from a three-year low of 91.104 set on Wednesday. (Reporting by Richard Leong Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
